text: @globalnews #Beardeau is so busy ass kissing the #CCP and #Chinese politicians, that you know he’s done as he was told, because they are praising him on his weakness as a leader. Canada needs a leader, not this twat! #TrudeauLiedPeopleDied #TrudeauMustGo #cdnpoli #Covid19
